Title: LCARS TNG
Description: This is a revival of the LCARS WinForms controls by Marcelo Chavez. The project was hosted on CodeProject, but seems dead since 2006.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is a revival of the LCARS WinForms controls by Marcelo Chavez. The project was hosted on CodeProject, but seems dead since 2006.

About the original work
The original project was created by Marcelo Chavez in 2006. The project seems dead since then. The original project was published on CodeProject:
http://www.codeproject.com/KB/miscctrl/lcars_net_controls.aspx
under a CodeProject license. I changed the license to LGPL to publish here, tell me if there is a better match.
